構.definition: to construct; to form; to make up; to compose; literary composition; paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

構型.definition: structure; (spatial) configuration; arrangement; (chemistry) configuration (molecular, electron etc)

構思.definition: to design; to plot; to plan out; to compose; to draw a mental sketch; conception; plan; idea; composition

構想圖.definition: notional diagram (i.e. made-up picture or artist's impression for news story)

構成.definition: to constitute; to form; to compose; to make up; to configure (computing)

構造運動.definition: tectonic movement; movement of earth's crust

構陷.definition: to frame; to bring false charges against
